description:
A first paddle you won't need to upgrade. All the benefits of a bent-shaft paddle are in this budget friendly option. The keeps the weight down for long days or ocean tours. Contoured grips, versatile blade shape and a carbon shaft set you up for pure enjoyment on the water.

  • Durable fiberglass/nylon blades
  • Light, stiff carbon shaft
  • Blade shape suits high and low angle paddlers, with a large surface area for powerful strokes
  • Soft Advantage Grips dampen vibration
  • Ergonomic grips promote proper hand placement
  • 7 degree wrist offset reduces shoulder fatigue and strain on your forearms
  • Kingpin Connection gives you 12 blade angle options on 15 degree increments
name: Accent Energy Hybrid Touring Paddle
